attributes.action: Confer a Knighthood on Paul Staines aka Guido Fawkes in his last Honours List for Services to Politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Paul Staines, blogging as Guido Fawkes, has done an immense service to the nation in exposing political sleaze, for example troughing MPs, corrupt peers, hypocitical government ministers, ministerial and prime ministerial lies, etc. He has also given us many brilliant jokes and 'labels' e.g. his "Gordon is a Moron" T-shirt. Paul would make a much better Knight or Peer that any of the huge list of nonentities and crooks that the Prime Minister included in the 2009/10 New Year's Honours list.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
